General.Name: Yankershop Food Co Ltd
General.Description: YanKer shop Food Co.,Ltd researches and develops, produces, and sells leisure food products in China and internationally. The company offers bean products, candied roasted seeds and nuts, vegetarian food, meat products, leisure snacks, and dried fruits. It also provides baking, spicy strip, dried mango, fish tofu, and dry series products. In addition, it offers dried beans, potato chips, bread, cakes, and hot pepper products. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Tower A, Office Building, Changsha, China, 410005
